item.title: Mary add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Mary add a quote by A.A. Milne
Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I have heard there are troubles of more than one kind. Some come from ahead and some come from behind. But I've bought a big bat. I'm all ready you see. Now my troubles are going to have troubles with me!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, It's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope. Which is what I do, And that enables you to laugh at life's realities." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're never too old, too wacky, too wild, to pick up a book and read to a child." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mary add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "When you undervalue what you do, the world will undervalue who you are." -- Oprah Winfrey
